## TTraceEntity type

Draws traces for cartesian 2d plots.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TTraceEntity<TArray extends TTypedArray> = T2dAbsoluteZIndexTrait & TTrace2dDisplaySettingsTrait & IDataTrait<ICartesian2dTraceEntityConnector<TArray>> & TChangeTrackedTrait;
```
